author: holiman
content: Hey ho. We (mainly <@!206016661470314496> ) want's to change the `eth/66` spec:  https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3228 (only `GetBlockHeaders`). Would like to discuss this on next ACD, but if anyone has any thoughts/objections already, feel free to discuss

content: I'm happy to give nevermind the color currently used for trinity
